text: Batman Forever is a 1995 American action-adventure movie directed by Joel Schumacher and based on the DC Comics character Batman. It starres Val Kilmer as Batman. Tommy Lee Jones, Jim Carrey and Nicole Kidman also act. This was released June 16, 1995 across the United States. It grossed over $330 million at the box office. It got mixed reviews from the critics. Originally intended as a sequel to Batman Returns with Michael Keaton and Michelle Pfeiffer reprising their roles and Tim Burton supposed to come back to direct, the movie was instead turned into a reboot and is the first installment of Joel Schumacher's Batman duology. Despite this Michael Gougg and Chris played Alfred and Commisary Gordon again. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 action movies Category:1995 crime movies Category:1990s superhero movies Category:Batman (1989 movie series) Category:Batman movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on comic book characters Category:Movies directed by Joel Schumacher Category:Screenplays by Akiva Goldsman Category:Sequel movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Batman Forever
